properties.name: client-url.protocol
properties.description: Protocol to whitelist in cors filter which the client uses. e.g. http/https.

properties.name: client-url.domain
properties.description: domain name to whitelist in cors filter which the client uses. e.g. xyz.com.

properties.name: client-url.port
properties.description: Port number to whitelist in cors filter which the client uses. e.g. 80/443.

properties.name: app-secret
properties.description: Secret which is used for JWT Tokens.
